Vendor Information

Company name is required. Only alphabets, spaces, and hyphens are allowed.
Phone number is required. Phone number must be exactly 10 digits.
Email is required. Invalid email format.
GSTIN is required. GSTIN format be like- 27ABCDE1234F2Z5
PAN is required. PAN format be like ABCDE1234F
VAT is required. VAT format be like 27-1234567890-VAT
Website format be like www.example.com
